p: C. longa extracts arrested endometriosis in dose-dependent manner. It inhibited the expression of MMP-9 and TNF-Î±, and increased the levels of TIMP-1 [ 160]. Furthermore, C. longa increased the activity of IL-10-1082 A, an anti-inflammatory cytokine gene promoter [ 161]. Pro-apoptotic activity of C. longa has been demonstrated through the enhancement of caspase-3, 9, cytochrome c and Bax [ 162].
